short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A game based on shooting down the enemies in space. Game made by @gammert54(Adam) idea inspired by Chen!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This game Space Blasters was my second ever extension game! This game is based on shooting down enemy's that fall from the sky. Your goal is to reach to the end of the enemies shower. If you do reach, you are a champion as it gets harder and harder as you go on. (That makes it impossible)
